mapper.select: SELECT tmp1.child_idx, tmp1.calorie_consumption, tmp1.title, tmp1.record_date, tmp1.score FROM (SELECT s.song_idx, s.calorie_consumption, s.title, p.record_date, p.play_record_idx, p.child_idx, p.score_total AS score FROM songList s JOIN playRecord p ON s.song_idx = p.song_idx WHERE p.record_date LIKE CONCAT(#{date}, '%')) AS tmp1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT play_record_idx FROM scoreRecord GROUP BY play_record_idx) AS tmp2 ON tmp1.play_record_idx = tmp2.play_record_idx
SELECT name, category FROM foodList WHERE search_name like CONCAT (#{word}, '%') limit 5

SELECT b.child_idx, b.weight, b.height, b.bmi, DATE_FORMAT(b.record_date, '%y-%m') AS record_date FROM bodyRecord b JOIN (SELECT child_idx, MAX(record_date) AS record_date FROM bodyRecord WHERE child_idx = #{childIdx} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(record_date, '%y-%m')) AS t ON t.child_idx = b.child_idx AND t.record_date = b.record_date ORDER BY b.record_date DESC LIMIT 7;

WITH child_info AS ( SELECT weight, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, birth_date, CURDATE()) AS age_month, IF(gender = 0, 2, 1) as gender FROM bodyRecord b INNER JOIN children c ON b.child_idx = c.child_idx WHERE b.child_idx = #{childIdx} ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 1 )
SELECT weight, w.percentile_1th, w.percentile_3th, w.percentile_5th, w.percentile_10th, w.percentile_15th, w.percentile_25th, w.percentile_50th, w.percentile_75th, w.percentile_85th, w.percentile_90th, w.percentile_95th, w.percentile_97th, w.percentile_99th FROM child_info c INNER JOIN weightByAge w ON c.age_month = w.age_month AND c.gender = w.gender;

WITH child_info AS ( SELECT height, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, birth_date, CURDATE()) AS age_month, IF(gender = 0, 2, 1) as gender FROM bodyRecord b INNER JOIN children c ON b.child_idx = c.child_idx WHERE b.child_idx = #{childIdx} ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 1 )
SELECT height, h.percentile_1th, h.percentile_3th, h.percentile_5th, h.percentile_10th, h.percentile_15th, h.percentile_25th, h.percentile_50th, h.percentile_75th, h.percentile_85th, h.percentile_90th, h.percentile_95th, h.percentile_97th, h.percentile_99th FROM child_info c INNER JOIN heightByAge h ON c.age_month = h.age_month AND c.gender = h.gender;
